title: Improves keypad entry UI
message:
Improves keypad entry UI

Improves speed of unicodeToAscii converter

Adds open parenthesis for sqrt so it is easier to understand

Improves ColorButton; now actually indicates the pressed state!

Adds ability to put longpress hints on ColorButton

Adds link for donation

title: Changed from colloquial 'weight' to more accurate 'mass'.
message:
Changed from colloquial 'weight' to more accurate 'mass'.

Added some more commentary in the examples of the README.

Changed cube/square button icon back to "x²". Other symbol didn't show
up on some devices.

title: Added advanced keypad; translations.
message:
Added advanced keypad; translations.

Added an advanced keypad with many functions. It can be activated by
swiping the numpad to the left (just like the built-in calculator,
although much slicker and more powerful ;-) ).

Added Russian translations (thanks, Andrejs Gorbunovs!)

Added translations from the stock calculator. These probably won't
change much, but it's better to have them than otherwise.

Extracted more strings for translation.

message: Published v0.9 to market.

title: Added more Italian translations.
message: Added more Italian translations.

title: Fixed locale bug with missing 'gallons'.
message:
Fixed locale bug with missing 'gallons'.

In units, "gallon" and other imperial units don't come up for non-US,UK
locales. This updates the initial weights so that the unit won't show up
as a suggestion despite that.

Updated strings to use numbered placeholders.

message: Added button auto width-scaling.

message:
Improved edit text aesthetics some more.

Made the text boxes fill their area.

title: Aesthetic improvements. New entry area that better matches the theme.
message:
Aesthetic improvements. New entry area that better matches the theme.

Added in button text auto-scaling.

Cleaned up cruft from previous graphics.

title: Fixed accidental loss of precision by converting to Float.
message: Fixed accidental loss of precision by converting to Float.

title: Restyled and moved backspace button so it is out of the way.
message:
Restyled and moved backspace button so it is out of the way.

Before, it the backspace button would sometimes get hidden by the
drop-down menus, which made it very hard to use. The new style looks a
whole lot better, as well.

title: Fixed crash on initial load and closed cursors.
message:
Fixed crash on initial load and closed cursors.

Fixed a crash that occurred when the units were first loading
and the app was issued a configuration change (screen rotation).

Reworked the UnitUsageDBHelper to properly close cursors. Also
properly uses the FilterQueryProvider.

Preserve drawer open/close state.

message: Closed neglected databases after opening them.
